scripts.docker-run: docker run -d --rm --name moonbeam_development -p 9944:9944 -p 9933:9933 purestake/moonbeam:$(grep MOONBEAM_CLIENT_VERSION .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --dev --ws-external --rpc-external
scripts.hardhat-test: npm --prefix ./test/builders/build/eth-api/dev-env/hardhat run update-packages && npm --prefix ./test/builders/build/eth-api/dev-env/hardhat run test
scripts.waffle-test: npm --prefix ./test/builders/build/eth-api/dev-env/waffle run update-and-build && npm --prefix ./test/builders/build/eth-api/dev-env/waffle run test
scripts.test: npm run python-test && npm run hardhat-test && npm run waffle-test && npm run javascript-test
